articles.content: All the signs are there. Philip Osborne (Owen Teale) started off the series as the chief inspector who demanded that a young DS Steve Arnott (Martin Compston) lie about what went wrong during a faile… [+1148 chars]

articles.content:
Daredevils have been parachuting off the Derbyshire set of Mission Impossible.
The new Tom Cruise movie is being filmed at a quarry at Stoney Middleton, where the production company has built a fake… [+1559 chars]

articles.title: Hugh Jackman trolls Ryan Reynolds with New York cop in hopes of getting Deadpool 3 role - The Independent
articles.description: Pair have been embroiled in a long-running comic ‘feud’ for years
articles.content:
Hugh Jackman has trolled Ryan Reynolds by using a police officer to bag him a role in Deadpool 3.

articles.author: Mark Kermode
articles.title: Nomadland review – Chloe Zhao’s triumphant ode to community - The Guardian
articles.description: Zhao’s triple Oscar winner, inspired by the ‘new nomads’ of recession-hit America, eschews conflict in favour of quiet humanity
articles.content: Accepting her Oscar for best director last week, the Chinese film-maker Chloé Zhao remarked: I have always found goodness in the people I met, everywhere I went in the world. That sentiment runs thro… [+3683 chars]
